original_title: Grrrl Love and Revolution: Riot Grrrl NYC
overview: Documents the underground feminist punk movement 'Riot Grrrl', a network of bands and fanzines that called for 'grrrl love' and 'grrrl empowerment' and whose fiery rhetoric and groundbreaking performances resuscitated both feminism and punk rock.
title: Grrrl Love and Revolution: Riot Grrrl NYC
